item.title: Evidence Based Clinical Application of Personalised Medicine
item.author: youremail@example.com (Adrian Zucco)
item.description: Guest lecturer in medical Artificial Intelligence and Real-World Evidence sessions since 2022. Course held in fall under the Master in Precision Medicine at the University of Copenhagen.
